long_description: Just in time for springtime fun, the lightweight, athletic REI Carbon River soft-shell jacket offers just the right amount of protection for the warmer months. Highly breathable, durable 2-way stretch fabric dries fast and blocks winds up to 40 mph; the Durable Water Repellent finish resists rain. Collar, cuffs and hem feature a soft, wicking facing fabric. Cleanly finished full-length storm guard has a folded and glued edge. Zip hand pockets, zip chest pocket with media headphone port and internal drop-in pockets. Clean, die-cut welded zipper openings on hand and and chest pockets. REI Carbon River jacket has an active fit for a full range of motion.
short_description: Just in time for springtime fun, the lightweight, athletic REI Carbon River soft-shell jacket offers just the right amount of protection for the warmer months.
